DatabaseApplication.​ThreadController
DatabaseApplication.​ThreadController

This class maintains the threads for the <DatbaseAPplication> and handles starting and shutting them down

Variables
Thread objects
MConsumer

the object for TMCon

CConsumer

the object for <TCon>

CommandCon

the object for COMCon

CommandPro

the object for COMPro

Threads
TMCon

reads from the twitch_message topic on Kafka, analysis user messages and updates the database

TCCon

reads from the twitch_command topic on Kafka and adds new users to the database

COMcon

reads from the COMMANDS topic on Kafka and exicutes relevent commands

COMPro

produces to the COMMANDS topic on Kafka for IPC

COMCon
Thread COMCon
commandMessageQueue
ConcurrentQueue<string> commandMessageQueue

shared by the CommandProducer the TwitchCommandConsumer and the TwitchMessageConsumer

Functions
ThreadController
public ThreadController()

The constructor for ThreadController Initialises all objs and threads needed for the <DatabaseApplication> to run

listThreads
public void listThreads()

Provides feedback on the state of the threads in <DatabaseApplication>

exit
public void exit()

Closes all of the threads and then ends the program
